org.objectweb.cjdbc.console.wizard
Class WizardTabs

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JTabbedPane
                  org.objectweb.cjdbc.console.wizard.WizardTabs
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants, WizardListener
public class WizardTabs
extends javax.swing.JTabbedPane
implements WizardListener

This is a JTabbedPane used to contain all the tabs define in the org.objectweb.cjdbc.console.wizard.tab package.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Nicolas Modrzyk
See Also:
Serialized Form

public void importDocumentFromXml(org.dom4j.Document doc)

Parameters:
